title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 913.4 - Department review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 913.4 - Department review

State Regulations

Upon reasonable notice from the department, each railroad
shall make all bridge inspection and inventory records available and
accommodate field observations by department staff. While making such field
observations, railroad safety procedures shall be followed. Advance notice
shall be provided to the railroad of all scheduled field observations for which
a railroad representative must be present. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
913.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
